<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true/false if the current object and the indexed reference \\p Other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are/aren&#39;t in the same cache line of size \\p CLS. Two references are in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// have distance smaller than \\p MaxDistance in the dimension associated with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the given loop \\p L. Return false if the distance is not smaller than \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MaxDistance and std::nullopt if unsure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#a6b2b20549af64712df253586da3701a8">hasTemporalReuse</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference">IndexedReference</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the cost of the reference w.r.t. the given loop \\p L when it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// considered in the innermost position in the loop nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The cost is defined as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     + the reference stride is less than the cache line size, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     + the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       subscripts is zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - or otherwise equal to &#39;TripCount&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#a0182cdf55f9bfbdd904e3f5e6802316a">computeRefCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CLS) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A reference group represents a set of memory references that exhibit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// temporal or spacial reuse. Two references belong to the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reference group with respect to a inner loop L iff:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 they have a loop independent dependency, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 they have a loop carried dependence with a small dependence distance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    (e.g. less than 2) carried by the inner loop, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 they refer to the same array, and the subscript in their innermost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    dimension is less than or equal to &#39;d&#39; (where &#39;d&#39; is less than the cache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    line size)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Intuitively a reference group represents memory references that access</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the same cache line. Conditions 1,2 above account for temporal reuse, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// contition 3 accounts for spacial reuse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;IndexedReference&gt;</a>, 8&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ReferenceGroupTy, 8&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\c CacheCost represents the estimated cost of a inner loop as the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cache lines used by the memory references it contains.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The &#39;cache cost&#39; of a loop &#39;L&#39; in a loop nest &#39;LN&#39; is computed as the sum of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the cache costs of all of its reference groups when the loop is considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to be in the innermost position in the nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A reference group represents memory references that fall into the same cache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// line. Each reference group is analysed with respect to the innermost loop in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a loop nest. The cost of a reference is defined as follow:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - one if it is loop invariant w.r.t the innermost loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - equal to the loop trip count divided by the cache line times the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    reference stride if the reference stride is less than the cache line</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    size (CLS), and the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    other subscripts is zero (e.g. RefCost = TripCount/(CLS/RefStride))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - equal to the innermost loop trip count if the reference stride is greater</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    or equal to the cache line size CLS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#aacdc6d3e99463d9d10cafa0181aac761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#aacdc6d3e99463d9d10cafa0181aac761">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LoopTripCountTy = std::pair&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LoopCacheCostTy = std::pair&lt;const Loop &#42;, CacheCostTy&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a CacheCost object for the loop nest described by \\p Loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The optional parameter \\p TRT can be used to specify the max. distance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// between array elements accessed in a loop so that the elements are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// classified to have temporal reuse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp/#ada7c1594a393ede3ce32602d64d7ddb2">Loops</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;TTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">            std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; TRT = std::nullopt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a CacheCost for the loop nest rooted by \\p Root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The optional parameter \\p TRT can be used to specify the max. distance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// between array elements accessed in a loop so that the elements are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// classified to have temporal reuse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;CacheCost&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#aa74e490a12ab54ad9687e6844fe605f1">getCacheCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;Root, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstandardanalysisresults">LoopStandardAnalysisResults</a> &amp;AR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the estimated cost of loop \\p L if the given loop is part of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop nest associated with this object. Return -1 otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#ae14c5c1bfcf45b9ab5be1911532eca4c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#ae14c5c1bfcf45b9ab5be1911532eca4c">getLoopCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armsubtarget-cpp/#a6f57985fa144303082fa7517a52e6db9">IT</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">llvm::find&#95;if</a>(LoopCosts, &#91;&amp;L&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopCacheCostTy &amp;LCC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LCC.first == &amp;L;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armsubtarget-cpp/#a6f57985fa144303082fa7517a52e6db9">IT</a> != LoopCosts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>()) ? (&#42;IT).second : -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the estimated ordered loop costs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a43aa7ccf009b6e2a2ad77cee9693f6d1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;LoopCacheCostTy&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a43aa7ccf009b6e2a2ad77cee9693f6d1">getLoopCosts</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopCosts; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calculate the cache footprint of each loop in the nest (when it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// considered to be in the innermost position).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> calculateCacheFootprint();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Partition store/load instructions in the loop nest into reference groups.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Two or more memory accesses belong in the same reference group if they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// share the same cache line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> populateReferenceGroups(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> &amp;RefGroups) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calculate the cost of the given loop \\p L assuming it is the innermost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop in nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> computeLoopCacheCost(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> &amp;RefGroups) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the cost of a representative reference in reference group \\p RG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when the given loop \\p L is considered as the innermost loop in the nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The computed cost is an estimate for the number of cache lines used by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reference group. The representative reference cost is defined as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if (a) loop \\p L&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     induction variable is used only in the reference subscript associated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     with loop \\p L, and (b) the reference stride is less than the cache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     line size, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - TripCount otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> computeRefGroupCacheCost(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> &amp;RG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Sort the LoopCosts vector by decreasing cache cost.</span></CodeLine>
